subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4594 is on the way

Hi Lloyd Johnston,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. This shipping channel is currently at full capacity, so we will arrange an urgent UPS shipment for you. Delivery is expected on the 21st.
That's great, thank you very much.
